properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_DATE, MEM_PICTURE, MEM_GRADE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_GRADE != 4

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEM_NO ,MEM_NAME ,MEM_NICKNAME ,MEM_ID ,MEM_EMAIL ,ENROLL_DATE ,MEM_GRADE ,MEM_GRADE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBER_GRADE ON(MEM_GRADE = MEM_GRADE_NO) WHERE MEM_GRADE != 4 AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT MEM_NO ,MEM_NAME ,MEM_ID ,MEM_NICKNAME ,MEM_EMAIL ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,MEM_GRADE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBER_GRADE ON(MEM_GRADE = MEM_GRADE_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET
MEM_NAME = ? ,MEM_NICKNAME = ? ,MEM_EMAIL = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE ,MEM_GRADE = ? WHERE TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER_UPDATE VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_UPDATE.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,'Y' ) WHERE TB_MEMBER_UPDATE.MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER_UPDATE SET ( MEM_UPDATE_CON ,MEM_UPDATE_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? ,'Y' ) WHERE MEM_N0 = ?
